text:
ISBN-13: 9780141001821.
ISBN-10: 0141001828.
Title: In the Heart of the Sea.
Subtitle: The Tragedy of the Whaleship Essex.
Authors: Nathaniel Philbrick.
Categories: History.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=EaqOURNUL88C&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Recounts the story of the 1820 wreck of the whaleship Essex, which inspired Melville's classic "Moby-Dick," and describes its doomed crew's ninety-day attempt to survive whale attacks and the elements on three tiny lifeboats..
